stimulusHtml: Two skaters are initially at rest next to each other on frictionless ice. Skater A pushes on skater B. If skater A has greater mass than skater B, which of the following correctly relates the magnitudes of their momentums p and their kinetic energies K after the push?
choicesHtml: p A = p B     MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F16@   and  K A < K B MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C68@

p A = p B   and  K A = K B MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47F7@

p A = p B     MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F16@  and  K A > K B MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C6C@

p A < p B    and  K A < K B MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4917@

p A < p B    and  K A = K B MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4919@
